_comment: Japan compliance norms and standards database. Includes PSE, Radio Law, JIS, VCCI, METI and other Japanese regulatory requirements. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: Electrical Appliance and Material Safety Law - Specified Products
norms.applies_to: Specified electrical products (116 categories) including power supplies, chargers, lithium batteries
norms.description: Mandatory safety certification for Category A products. Requires third-party testing, factory inspection. Diamond-shaped PSE mark. Includes AC adapters, lithium-ion batteries, electrical cords.

norms.name: Electrical Appliance and Material Safety Law - Non-Specified Products
norms.applies_to: Non-specified electrical products (341 categories) including IT equipment, household appliances
norms.description: Self-declaration for Category B products. Circular PSE mark. Testing required but no factory inspection. Includes computers, printers, TVs, most consumer electronics.

norms.name: PSE Certification for Lithium-Ion Batteries
norms.description: Mandatory PSE certification for lithium-ion batteries as Category A specified product. Technical requirements based on JIS C 8712, JIS C 8714. Factory inspection required.

norms.name: Technical Conformity Certification for Radio Equipment
norms.applies_to: All radio transmitting equipment including WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular
norms.description: Mandatory certification under Radio Law. Technical conformity mark required on radio equipment. Covers 2.4GHz, 5GHz WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular, RFID. Testing at MIC-designated labs.

norms.name: Terminal Equipment Approval
norms.applies_to: Equipment connecting to public telecommunications network
norms.description: Approval required for terminal equipment connecting to telecom networks. Prevents harm to network. Includes wired phones, modems, fax machines, VoIP devices.

norms.name: Voluntary Control Council for Interference - Residential
norms.applies_to: Information technology equipment for residential use
norms.description: Voluntary EMC certification for residential ITE. Class B (more stringent) for residential environments. VCCI mark widely recognized. Registration required before sale.

norms.name: Voluntary Control Council for Interference - Commercial
norms.applies_to: Information technology equipment for commercial/industrial use
norms.description: Voluntary EMC certification for commercial ITE. Class A limits (less stringent than Class B). Must be labeled for commercial use only if Class A.

norms.name: Audio/Video, ICT Equipment - Safety
norms.description: Japanese Industrial Standard for ICT equipment safety. Harmonized with IEC 62368-1. Used for PSE certification of Category B products.

norms.name: Portable Lithium Secondary Cells and Batteries for Use in Portable Equipment - Safety Requirements
norms.applies_to: Portable lithium-ion cells and battery packs
norms.description: Japanese safety standard for portable lithium batteries. Based on IEC 62133. Required for PSE lithium battery certification.

norms.name: Safety Tests for Portable Lithium-Ion Secondary Cells and Batteries
norms.description: Test methods for safety evaluation of lithium-ion batteries. Used with JIS C 8712 for PSE certification.

norms.name: Information Technology Equipment - Safety (LEGACY)
norms.description: LEGACY standard for IT equipment safety. Replaced by JIS C 62368-1 but may still be referenced in older certifications.

norms.name: EMC - Generic Immunity Standard - Residential
norms.applies_to: Equipment for residential, commercial, light industrial
norms.description: Generic immunity standard for residential environments. Harmonized with IEC 61000-6-1.

norms.name: EMC - Generic Emission Standard - Residential
norms.applies_to: Equipment for residential, commercial, light industrial
norms.description: Generic emission standard for residential environments. Harmonized with IEC 61000-6-3.

norms.name: 2.4GHz Band Low Power Data Communication System
norms.description: Technical standard for 2.4GHz band wireless systems. Used for TELEC certification of WiFi, Bluetooth devices. Developed by ARIB (Association of Radio Industries and Businesses).

norms.name: 5GHz Band Wireless Access System
norms.description: Technical standard for 5GHz wireless LAN. Includes DFS (Dynamic Frequency Selection) requirements. Used for TELEC certification.

norms.name: 920MHz Band Telemeter, Telecontrol and Data Transmission Equipment
norms.description: Technical standard for 920MHz band low power wide area systems. Common for IoT, smart meters, sensors.

norms.name: Fire Prevention for Electrical Equipment
norms.applies_to: Electrical equipment that may pose fire risk
norms.description: Requirements to prevent fire hazards from electrical equipment. May require additional testing for high-power devices, heating elements. Local fire department approval.

norms.name: Pharmaceutical Affairs Law - Medical Devices
norms.description: Medical device approval under Pharmaceutical and Medical Device Act (PMDA oversight). Classification I-IV based on risk. QMS requirements similar to ISO 13485.

norms.name: Medical Device Pre-Market Approval
norms.description: PMDA (Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices Agency) approval process. Classes II-IV require approval or certification. Class I notification only. Clinical data often required.

norms.name: JIS Mark Certification
norms.description: Voluntary certification that product meets JIS (Japanese Industrial Standards). Shows quality commitment. Common for industrial products, materials, components.

norms.name: Japan Electrical Safety and Environment Technology Laboratories Certification
norms.description: Voluntary safety certification by JET. Demonstrates compliance beyond PSE requirements. Recognized quality mark. Factory inspection included.

norms.name: Act on Rational Use of Energy
norms.applies_to: Energy-consuming products including electronics, appliances, vehicles
norms.description: Top Runner program sets energy efficiency standards. Products must meet efficiency targets. Labeling requirements. Covers 30+ product categories.

norms.name: Energy Efficiency Top Runner Program
norms.description: Sets energy efficiency standards based on most efficient products. Target standards increase over time. Mandatory for covered products. Includes computers, displays, air conditioners.

norms.name: Japan RoHS - Marking for Presence of Specific Chemical Substances
norms.description: Voluntary marking indicating presence/absence of hazardous substances. Green mark if compliant, orange mark with percentage if exceeding limits. Based on EU RoHS but voluntary.

norms.name: Chemical Substances Control Law (CSCL)
norms.description: Regulates manufacture, import, use of chemical substances. Classification of Class I (prohibited), Class II (restricted) substances. Notification requirements.

norms.name: Occupational Safety and Health
norms.description: Requirements for workplace safety including machinery safety, chemical substance management. Affects industrial equipment design and labeling.

norms.id: Waste Management and Public Cleansing Law
norms.name: Waste Disposal and Recycling Requirements
norms.applies_to: Products generating industrial or municipal waste
norms.description: Regulations for waste disposal, recycling. Producer responsibility for certain products. Affects packaging, end-of-life management.

norms.name: Recycling Law for Specified Home Appliances
norms.applies_to: Air conditioners, TVs, refrigerators, washing machines
norms.description: Mandatory recycling system for specified home appliances. Retailers collect, manufacturers recycle. Consumers pay recycling fee.

norms.name: Law for Promotion of Effective Utilization of Resources - Batteries
norms.applies_to: Rechargeable batteries (Ni-Cd, Ni-MH, Li-ion, small sealed lead-acid)
norms.description: Mandatory recycling system for rechargeable batteries. Collection mark required. Manufacturers must facilitate collection and recycling.

norms.name: Road Transport Vehicle Law
norms.description: Type approval for vehicles sold in Japan. Safety standards, emissions requirements. Administered by MLIT (Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism).

norms.name: Road Traffic Safety Requirements
norms.description: Traffic safety regulations including lighting, mirrors, safety equipment requirements. Affects aftermarket automotive accessories.

norms.name: General Consumer Product Safety
norms.applies_to: Consumer products not covered by specific laws
norms.description: General safety requirements for consumer products. Serious product accident reporting obligations. Special Specified Products require PSC mark (pressure vessels, helmets, lighters).

norms.name: Product Safety of Consumer Products Mark
norms.applies_to: Special Specified Products (climbing equipment, bicycle helmets, pressure cookers, lighters)
norms.description: Mandatory safety certification for Special Specified Products under Consumer Product Safety Law. Third-party testing required. PSC mark mandatory.

norms.name: Safe Goods Mark
norms.description: Voluntary safety certification by Consumer Product Safety Association. Indicates product meets safety standards. Product liability insurance included. Covers toys, sports goods, household items.

norms.name: Safety Toy Mark
norms.description: Voluntary safety standard for toys by Japan Toy Association. Based on ISO 8124 and EN 71. Third-party testing. Widely recognized by consumers.

norms.name: Food Contact Materials Safety
norms.applies_to: Materials and articles in contact with food
norms.description: Safety requirements for food contact materials. Positive lists for certain materials (plastics, metals). Migration testing required. Enforced by Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare.

norms.name: Quality Management Systems (ISO 9001)
norms.description: Japanese adoption of ISO 9001. Quality management system requirements. JAB (Japan Accreditation Board) accredits certification bodies.

norms.name: Environmental Management Systems (ISO 14001)
norms.description: Japanese adoption of ISO 14001. Environmental management system requirements.

norms.name: Information Security Management Systems (ISO 27001)
norms.description: Japanese adoption of ISO/IEC 27001. Information security management system requirements. Important for IT products and services.

norms.name: Act on Protection of Personal Information (APPI)
norms.description: Japan's data protection law. Requirements for collection, use, storage of personal information. Similar to GDPR but with differences. Extraterritorial application.

norms.id: Act on Prevention of Unfair Competition
norms.name: Unfair Competition Prevention
norms.description: Protects against unfair competition including trademark infringement, trade secret misappropriation, false origin indications. Affects product marking and labeling.

norms.name: Restrictions on Premiums and Representations
norms.description: Regulates product advertising, labeling, premium offers. Prevents misleading representations. Affects product claims, promotional materials. Consumer Affairs Agency enforcement.

norms.name: Japanese Agricultural Standards Mark
norms.description: Quality certification for food and agricultural products. Indicates compliance with JAS standards. Includes organic certification. Not typically for electronics but relevant for packaging, food contact.

norms.name: Safety Requirements for Compressed Gas
norms.description: Safety requirements for high pressure gas containers and equipment. Affects aerosol products, gas cylinders, refrigerant systems. Licensing and inspection requirements.

norms.name: Building Code Compliance for Electrical Equipment
norms.description: Requirements for electrical equipment permanently installed in buildings. Affects lighting fixtures, HVAC systems, building automation. Local building code compliance.

norms.name: Specified Measuring Instruments
norms.description: Requirements for measuring instruments used in trade. Type approval, periodic inspection. Affects scales, meters, measuring devices. JCSS (Japan Calibration Service System) for traceability.

norms.name: IoT Security Certification
norms.description: Emerging voluntary certification for IoT device security. Based on international standards. Addresses growing security concerns for connected devices.

norms.name: Social Responsibility Guidance (ISO 26000)
norms.description: Japanese adoption of ISO 26000. Guidance on social responsibility including labor practices, environment, fair operating practices. Not certifiable but increasingly important.
